sentence: i will focus on five major issues, leaving the most important--lessons relating to the financial system and its regulation and supervision--to the last.3 lesson t1: monetary policy at the zero lower bound.4 before the great recession, textbooks used to say that once the central bank interest rate had reached zero, monetary policy could not be made more expansionary--otherwise known as the liquidity trap.
